column5: Any of you guys know where to get some building materials a bit cheaper than the big box stores?  Looking for framing lumber, osb mainly. Thanks

I got most of my lumber for my cabin through a smaller lumber yard here. Not too much choice as we have Home Hardware Building Center and the smaller guys Igloo Building Supplies. Probably didn't save a ton but the quality and customer service were worth it. You can check smaller lumber yards in your area and see what they are like.
Thanks Dave. I'll be building in Bancroft.   I'll take a look around there.
